name: Lucky Chip Spin
description:
Free addictive arcade games fun! Original coin pusher game full of excitement with casual coin shooting! Enjoy an awesomely crafted, real scale, coin pusher machine experience! Very easy to control but brings you infinite delight and surprise!
How to Play?
- Click and drop nickels on the table.
- Collect your coins by pushing coins off the table.
- Push coins into the box to make machine run.
- Use special items to win easier!
- Use the wall to protect items on board from falling down on both sides on coin pusher.
Features:
● One tap and easy control!
● Beautiful graphics and animation!
● Addictive gameplay!
● Excellent time killer game!
Download Lucky Chip Spin and see if this is your lucky Pusher!
